import React from 'react'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import Lottie from 'react-lottie-player' import {Button} from "reactstrap" import cookingWomen from '../assets/lottie/cookingWomen.json' const VirtualAssistant = () => { return(

OUR VIRTUAL KITCHEN ASSISTANT
WILL HELP YOU PREB

We'll send you a notification if you have our app or you
the link to your class.

When you check in for your cooking lesson, your Virtual Kitchen
Assistant will video call you through the platform.Then you'll get
cooking together.

{/* */}
) } export default VirtualAssistant;
